dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT OD_OB_EDID , OD_SC_ENTRY_DATE, OD_SC_REGION , OD_OB_PICKUP_LOCATION , OD_SC_SECTION , OD_OB_ISSUE_TYPE , OD_PB_CORR_ACTION , OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME , OD_SC_VEND_CONT_NAME , OD_PB_FQA_REQUESTER , OD_PB_DATE_VERIFIED, OD_OB_DISPUTE_YN , OD_PB_COMMENTS , OD_PB_QA_REQUESTER , OD_PB_DEFECT_CODE , OD_OB_SKU , OD_PB_ITEM_DESC , OD_OB_VPN , OD_OB_DEPT_ID , OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME , OD_OB_CLASS_ID , OD_OB_CLASS , OD_OB_SUBCLASS_ID , OD_OB_SUBCLASS , A.CREATED_BY , A.COLLECTION_ID , A.CREATION_DATE FROM Q_OD_OB_ED_V a , Q_OD_OB_ED_SKU_V B WHERE a.OD_OB_EDID = B.OD_OB_REF_EDID(+) AND NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X') = NVL(:p_region,NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_PICKUP_LOCATION,'X')= NVL (:p_location,NVL(OD_OB_PICKUP_LOCATION,'X')) AND NVL(OD_SC_SECTION,'X') = NVL(:p_section,NVL(OD_SC_SECTION,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_ISSUE_TYPE,'X') = NVL(:p_issue,NVL(OD_OB_ISSUE_TYPE,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_CORR_ACTION,'X') = NVL(:p_corrective_action,NVL(OD_PB_CORR_ACTION,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:p_vendor,NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_SC_VEND_CONT_NAME,'X') = NVL(:p_internal_business_owner,NVL(OD_SC_VEND_CONT_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_DISPUTE_YN,'X') = NVL(:p_affidavit,NVL(OD_OB_DISPUTE_YN,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_QA_REQUESTER,'X') = NVL(:p_qa,NVL(OD_PB_QA_REQUESTER,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_DEFECT_CODE,'X') = NVL(:p_classification,NVL(OD_PB_DEFECT_CODE,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_SKU,1) = NVL (:p_sku,NVL(OD_OB_SKU,1)) AND NVL(OD_OB_DEPT_ID ,1) = NVL(:p_dept_no,NVL(OD_OB_DEPT_ID,1)) AND NVL(OD_OB_CLASS_ID ,1) = NVL(:p_class_no,NVL(OD_OB_CLASS_ID,1)) AND NVL(OD_OB_SUBCLASS_ID ,1) = NVL(:p_subclass_no,NVL(OD_OB_SUBCLASS_ID,1)) ORDER BY 1,2
